info.title: PPS Business Cards API
info.description: API documentation for PPS Business Cards

post.summary: Authenticate company by API key and create a company API token

get.summary: Get all employees for a company
get.description: Fetch employees with optional related entities and wallet/sync info.

parameters.name: include_wallet_status
parameters.description: Include wallet status for each employee

parameters.name: include_sync_eligibility
parameters.description: Include sync eligibility for each employee

parameters.name: include_all
parameters.description: Include all relations (websites, phones, emails, addresses, buttons, social links)

parameters.name: include_websites
parameters.description: Include employee websites relation

parameters.name: include_phone_numbers
parameters.description: Include employee phone numbers relation

parameters.name: include_emails
parameters.description: Include employee emails relation

parameters.name: include_addresses
parameters.description: Include employee addresses relation

parameters.name: include_social_links
parameters.description: Include employee social links relation

parameters.name: include_buttons
parameters.description: Include employee buttons relation

post.summary: Create or update employees with related data
post.description: This endpoint updates multiple employees and their related data (social links, phone numbers, emails, websites, addresses, buttons). All operations are performed in a database transaction, so if any error occurs, changes are rolled back.

employees.description: Array of employee objects to update or create

message.example: An error occurred while updating employees.

get.description: Fetch a single employee (card) by ID for the authenticated company. Optional query params control included relations.

parameters.name: employeeId
parameters.description: ID of the employee (card)

parameters.name: include_wallet_status
parameters.description: Include wallet status if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_sync_eligibility
parameters.description: Include sync eligibility if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_all
parameters.description: Include all relations if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_social_links
parameters.description: Include social links if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_phone_numbers
parameters.description: Include phone numbers if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_emails
parameters.description: Include emails if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_addresses
parameters.description: Include addresses if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_websites
parameters.description: Include websites if true (1 or true)

parameters.name: include_buttons
parameters.description: Include buttons if true (1 or true)

200.description: Successful fetch of a single employee

put.summary: Clear a single employee's details and generate a new code
put.description: Clears all employee card fields, related records, and generates a new code. Employee must belong to the company associated with the API token.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Employee ID to clear

message.example: Employee cleared and new code generated successfully.

404.description: Employee not found or does not belong to company

put.summary: Clear multiple employees' details and generate new codes
put.description: Clears all fields and related data for multiple employees and generates new codes. All employees must belong to the company associated with the API token.

ids.description: Array of employee IDs to clear

message.example: 3 employee(s) cleared and new codes generated successfully.

404.description: No employees found or do not belong to company

500.description: Failed to clear one or more employees

post.summary: Assign multiple NFC cards to multiple employees
post.description: Assigns NFC cards to employees. All IDs must belong to the company from the API token.

employee.description: Employee ID to assign NFC cards to

nfc_ids.description: Array of NFC card IDs to assign

post.summary: Unassign multiple NFC cards from employees
post.description: Unassigns NFC cards. All IDs must belong to the company from the API token.

nfc_ids.description: Array of NFC card IDs to unassign

bearerAuth.description: Enter your bearer token in the format **Bearer <token>**
